title: No Braking!
description:
Kyle Hyatt and James McKeone used to host the Peteresen Automotive Museum podcast, CarStories, but have struck out on their own with a new show and brand, No Braking! They stop by to talk about 80s and 90s cars, cheap Z28 Camaros, which car to "Safari" out, rallying Bentleys, and a ton more. 

 

Check out all their work at http://www.nobraking.com/

This show is also available as a video, full of pictures, videos, and other assets pertaining to the conversation. https://youtu.be/ST7E595cK0w

 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
